sentences.sContent: These may either be the drug in question or some analogue of it that.
sentences.sContent_eng: These may either be the drug in question or some analogue of it that.
sentences.sCn: 这些小分子可以是目标药物或其它一些类似物。

sentences.sContent: The kanic acid (KA) is a structural analogue of the aminoglutaminic acid, excitatory amino acid in the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: The kanic acid (KA) is a structural analogue of the aminoglutaminic acid, excitatory amino acid in the brain.
sentences.sCn: 海人酸（KA）是脑内兴奋性氨基酸递质—谷氨酸的结构类似物。

sentences.sContent: DCA, or dichloroacetic acid, is an analogue of acetic acid in which chlorine atoms replace two of the three hydrogen atoms on the methyl group.
sentences.sContent_eng: DCA, or dichloroacetic acid, is an analogue of acetic acid in which chlorine atoms replace two of the three hydrogen atoms on the methyl group.
sentences.sCn: DCA也叫二氯乙酸或二氯醋酸，是一种类似乙酸的化合物，但乙基团上有两个氢原子被氯原子所取代。

synos.tran: 类似物；类似情况；对等的人
类似的；相似物的；模拟计算机的

phrases.pCn: 模拟信号；仿真讯号；非数字讯号；模拟试验

words.tran: 类似的；[昆] 同功的；可比拟的
对…作类比；以类推来说明（等于analogize）

trans.tranOther: a physical object or quantity, such as a pointer on a dial or a voltage, used to measure or represent another quantity
